description: Surrogate primary key for this metadata row defining a parentâ€“child DTO relationship; uniquely identifies the record.
Logical name of the child collection/relationship on the parent data type as exposed by the API/model.
Identifier of the parent DTO/data type this child definition belongs to (likely a foreign key to the DTO types table; confirm with SME).
Identifier of the child DTO/data type participating in the relationship (likely a foreign key to the DTO types table; confirm with SME).
Name of the attribute on the child data type that references the parent record (the join/foreign-key field used to relate child rows to their parent).
